mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT a.author_id AS authorId , a.news_letter_header_seq AS newsLetterHeaderSeq , a.header_title AS headerTitle , a.subscribers , a.week_day AS weekDay , a.reg_date AS regDate , b.cat1_code AS cat1Code , b.cat2_code AS cat2Code , b.cat3_code AS cat3Code , MAX(CASE WHEN b.cat1_code = c.cat_code THEN c.cat_name END) AS cat1Name , MAX(CASE WHEN b.cat2_code = c.cat_code THEN c.cat_name END) AS cat2Name , MAX(CASE WHEN b.cat3_code = c.cat_code THEN c.cat_name END) AS cat3Name , ip.image_path AS imagePath , ip.saved_name AS savedName , ip.origin_name AS originName FROM joo.news_letter_header a INNER JOIN joo.category_combi b ON a.category_combi_seq = b.category_combi_seq INNER JOIN joo.category c ON c.cat_code IN (b.cat1_code, b.cat2_code, b.cat3_code) LEFT OUTER JOIN joo.image_path ip on a.news_letter_header_seq = ip.news_letter_header_seq WHERE a.author_id = #{param} AND a.db_status = 'OK' GROUP BY a.author_id, a.header_title, a.subscribers, a.reg_date, b.cat1_code, b.cat2_code, b.cat3_code;

SELECT n.news_letter_seq AS newsLetterSeq , n.title , n.content , n.cost , n.free_yn AS freeYn , n.description , n.news_letter_header_seq AS newsLetterHeaderSeq , n.view FROM joo.news_letter n WHERE n.news_letter_header_seq = #{param}

SELECT nh.news_letter_header_seq AS newsLetterHeaderSeq , nh.category_combi_seq AS categoryCombiSeq , nh.header_title AS headerTitle , nh.subscribers , nh.author_id AS authorId , m.username AS authorName FROM joo.news_letter_header nh,joo.Member m WHERE nh.news_letter_header_seq = #{param} AND nh.author_id = m.id

SELECT n.news_letter_seq as newsLetterSeq , n.title , n.content , n.cost , n.free_yn AS freeYn , n.description , n.news_letter_header_seq AS newsLetterHeaderSeq , nh.category_combi_seq AS categoryCombiSeq , nh.header_title AS headerTitle , nh.subscribers , nh.author_id AS authorId , m.username AS authorName , ip.origin_name AS originName , ip.saved_name AS savedName , ip.image_path AS imagePath FROM joo.news_letter n INNER JOIN news_letter_header nh ON n.news_letter_header_seq = nh.news_letter_header_seq INNER JOIN joo.Member m ON nh.author_id = m.id LEFT OUTER JOIN joo.image_path ip ON n.news_letter_seq = ip.news_letter_seq WHERE n.news_letter_seq = #{param}

SELECT DISTINCT a.author_id AS authorId , a.news_letter_header_seq AS newsLetterHeaderSeq , a.header_title AS headerTitle , a.subscribers , a.week_day AS weekDay , a.reg_date AS regDate , b.cat1_code AS cat1Code , b.cat2_code AS cat2Code , b.cat3_code AS cat3Code , MAX(CASE WHEN b.cat1_code = c.cat_code THEN c.cat_name END) AS cat1Name , MAX(CASE WHEN b.cat2_code = c.cat_code THEN c.cat_name END) AS cat2Name , MAX(CASE WHEN b.cat3_code = c.cat_code THEN c.cat_name END) AS cat3Name , im.image_path as imagePath , im.origin_name as originName , im.saved_name as savedName FROM joo.news_letter_header a INNER JOIN joo.category_combi b ON a.category_combi_seq = b.category_combi_seq INNER JOIN joo.category c ON c.cat_code IN (b.cat1_code, b.cat2_code, b.cat3_code) INNER JOIN joo.image_path ON im.news_letter_header_seq = a.news_letter_header_seq WHERE a.week_day = #{param} AND a.db_status = 'OK' GROUP BY a.author_id, a.header_title, a.subscribers, a.reg_date, b.cat1_code, b.cat2_code, b.cat3_code ORDER BY subscribers desc LIMIT 8;
